contentBlocks.title: General Requirements
items: A building must be provided with an energy monitoring system that measures and records the energy consumption of the building
The energy monitoring system must be capable of measuring and recording the energy consumption of each major energy consuming system in the building
The energy monitoring system must be capable of measuring and recording the energy consumption of each major energy consuming system in the building at intervals of not more than 15 minutes
The energy monitoring system must be capable of storing the energy consumption data for a period of not less than 12 months
The energy monitoring system must be capable of displaying the energy consumption data in a format that is easily understood by the building operator
The energy monitoring system must be capable of exporting the energy consumption data in a format that is compatible with commonly used energy management software
The energy monitoring system must be capable of generating reports that show the energy consumption of the building and each major energy consuming system in the building
The energy monitoring system must be capable of generating alerts when the energy consumption of the building or any major energy consuming system in the building exceeds a predetermined threshold
The energy monitoring system must be capable of being accessed remotely by the building operator
The energy monitoring system must be capable of being integrated with the building management system
